note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: 'Abschr. versandt: 21/I. 1881' [Copy sent 21 January 1881].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. med. et phil. Ferd. Baron von Müller Mr F D H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: d. Z. Stiftsrath des freien Deutschen Hochstiftes

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom (Poststempel 10.XII) v. J. mit welcher Sie Güte hatten, uns Ihren Eucalyptographica Seventh Decade freundlichst mitzutheilen, danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr. med. and phil. Ferdinand Baron von Mueller Mr F.D.H.
Meister des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy].
State plant researcher at present councillor of the Freies Deutsche Hochstift Melbourne Victoria

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 19 Snow-month
i.e. January. 1881

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of (postmarked 10 December last year) with which you had the goodness to kindly convey to us your Eucalyptographia Seventh Decade ,
B80.13.14.
we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
V.
Dr. G. H. Otto Volger.
